languages.text: "Кровь мучеников... Скажите, что у вашей спутницы просто истерика".
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
languages.original_text: "Кровь мучеников... Скажите, что у вашей спутницы просто истерика".

traits.locale_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."
"Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

languages.text: "Beim Blut des Märtyrers ... Sagt mir, dass das nur ein hysterischer Ausbruch Eurer Gefährtin war."
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Blut des Märtyrers ... Sagt mir, dass das nur ein hysterischer Ausbruch Eurer Gefährtin war."

languages.text: « Par le sang des martyrs... Dites-moi qu'il s'agit juste d'un épisode d'hystérie de votre auxiliaire. »
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: « Par le sang des martyrs... Dites-moi qu'il s'agit juste d'un épisode d'hystérie de votre auxiliaire. »

languages.text: «Por la sangre de los mártires... Dígame que eso solo ha sido un exabrupto histérico por parte de su acompañante».
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: «Por la sangre de los mártires... Dígame que eso solo ha sido un exabrupto histérico por parte de su acompañante».

languages.text: “殉道者之血在上……这应该只是你的同伴突然情绪失控吧？”
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: “殉道者之血在上……这应该只是你的同伴突然情绪失控吧？”

languages.text: 「殉教者たちの血よ…あなたの仲間のヒステリックな発作にすぎないと言ってください」
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: 「殉教者たちの血よ…あなたの仲間のヒステリックな発作にすぎないと言ってください」

languages.text: "Şehit kanı... Umarım arkadaşınız yalnızca isterik bir sinir boşalması yaşıyordur."
languages.original_text: "Martyrs' blood... Tell me this is just a hysterical outburst on your companion's part."

traits.locale_text: "Şehit kanı... Umarım arkadaşınız yalnızca isterik bir sinir boşalması yaşıyordur."
